prompts: Create a steel-type Pokemon with magnet-like features and a metallic body.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from Magnemite into a powerful magnet creature.
Design a unique Pokemon that can control electricity and has a round shape.
Show me a Pokemon that has three spherical bodies connected by metal.
Generate a creature that embodies both Electric and Steel types with a sleek look.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a futuristic design.
Give me a Pokemon with a magnetic personality and a knack for technology.
